channel.title: 'Use' sound, where in folder, which name?
channel.description:
Hi,
I want to know where I can find the 'use' sound?
Thanks!

item.title: 'Use' sound, where in folder, which name?

item.description:
BMS\sound\player is where the sound should be located.

item.title: 'Use' sound, where in folder, which name?
item.dc:creator: Dragunov2
item.description:
I have installed an improvement pack from the gamebanana site and it’s replaced with another sound now, just want to know where I can find those file

Read full topic
item.source: 'Use' sound, where in folder, which name?

item.title: 'Use' sound, where in folder, which name?
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
If it’s the same as HL2 (which I’m sure it is) then sound\player\suit_denydevice.wav.

I don’t think it was replaced in Black Mesa, so it won’t be there, but if another file is to take it’s place it should read from that file instead.

Read full topic
